On both occasions, he was unable to score a single point and in doing so became the first top-three pick to go scoreless in his debut since Otto Porter Jr. in 2013.
He had a far more successful game… [+3569 chars]

articles.description: The Philadelphia 76ers and Matisse Thybulle seem to be going in different directions. The Philadelphia 76ers are 2-0, and while the start of the season has...
articles.content: The Philadelphia 76ers are 2-0, and while the start of the season has been far from perfect, the early signs are good. This Sixers team is going to win plenty of games. That said, Matisse Thybulle — … [+4568 chars]
